7. Data sharing
Do you know which data repository you will use to share your data?
In section 2 you mention the website of the research group where datasets are already available (https://www.mech.kuleuven.be/en/cib/op) but what i miss here is documentation and Readme files, etc that give context to these data that would facilitate reuse. Make sure your data are accompanied by sufficient documentation / ReadMe files.
